name: Annum
description:
This unique game has a new theme once a year. Play now and escape the maze!

Annum's theme is a new idea, not yet explored in the game development world.
This year, the game is a solo, 3D horror maze game.

You're in the middle of a very large maze...it's dark and you need to get out...fast
Something in the darkness knows where you are, it knows your every move and it won't let you leave.

We plan to add multiple gamemodes and steam achievements soon.
